input.sentences: the roof top party was really fun .
everyone enjoyed the food | drinks and glowsticks .
there was even this cool mural up there .
however someone had vandalized this on the way to where we were going .
output.sentences: The view from the roof party was amazing.
I enjoyed a range of food with everyone there.
Me and my girlfriend took lots of pictures.
One picture that stood out was of this really cool wall mural.
Not all the walls where as cool as the mural, as some had been vandalized.
